title: NFL Week 1 Ratings, Sunday Ticket, U.S. Open
itunes:title: NFL Week 1 Ratings, Sunday Ticket, U.S. Open
description:
NFL week 1 viewership is up, Amazon looks to be the front runner to land NFL Sunday Ticket, and 18-year-old qualifier Emma Raducanu caps an historic US Open run with her first Grand Slam title. Scarlet Fu, Michael Barr, and Mike Lynch discuss all that and more on this Monday edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
